resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107669</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107669</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205993</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Collected Learning Units in Mathematics and Statisticsematics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesammelte erlernenmaßeinheiten in der Mathematik
und in Statisticsematics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unités d'étude rassemblées dans les 
mathématiques et le Statisticsematics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidades de aprendizagem coletadas na matemática e
no Statisticsematics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unità imparanti raccolte nella matematica ed in 
Statisticsematics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλεχθείσες μονάδες εκμάθησης στα μαθηματικά και 
Statisticsematics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Unidades que aprenden recogidas en matemáticas y 
Statisticsematics</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides more than 200 instructional units in arithmetic, algebra, calculus, data analysis, fractions, geometry, number theory, pre-algebra, pre-calculus, probability, statistics, and trigonometry. The units were developed by teachers attending summer institutes sponsored by the National Security Agency.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt mehr als 200 anweisende Maßeinheiten in 
der Arithmetik, in der Algebra, im Kalkül, in der Datenanalyse, in 
den Brüchen, in der Geometrie, in der Zahltheorie, in der Voralgebra,
im Vorkalkül, in der Wahrscheinlichkeit, in den Statistiken und in 
der Trigonometrie zur Verfügung. Die Maßeinheiten wurden von 
den Lehrern entwickelt, welche die Sommerinstitute bedienen, die durch
die Staatssicherheit Agentur gefördert wurden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit plus de 200 unités d'instruction en 
arithmétique, algèbre, calcul, analyse de données, fractions, 
géométrie, théorie de nombre, pré-algèbre, pré-calcul, 
probabilité, statistiques, et trigonométrie. Les unités ont 
été développées par des professeurs servant des instituts d'été 
commandités par l'agence de sécurité nationale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece mais de 200 unidades instrutivas na 
aritmética, na álgebra, no cálculo, na análise de dados, nas 
frações, na geometria, na teoria do número, na pre-álgebra, no 
pre-cálculo, na probabilidade, nos statistics, e no trigonometry. 
As unidades foram desenvolvidas pelos professores que atendem 
aos institutos do verão patrocinados pela agência da segurança 
nacional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce più di 200 unità didattiche in 
aritmetica, algebra, calcolo, analisi di dati, frazioni, geometria, 
teoria di numero, pre-algebra, pre-calcolo, probabilità, statistiche 
e trigonometria. Le unità sono state sviluppate dagli 
insegnanti che assistono agli istituti di estate promossi dall'agenzia
di sicurezza nazionale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει περισσότερες από 200 εκπαιδευτικές μονάδες
στην αριθμητική, την άλγεβρα, τον υπολογισμό, την ανάλυση 
στοιχείων, τα μέρη, τη γεωμετρία, τη θεωρία αριθμού, την 
προ-άλγεβρα, τον προ-υπολογισμό, την πιθανότητα, τις στατιστικές, 
και trigonometry. Οι μονάδες αναπτύχθηκαν από τους 
δασκάλους που παρευρίσκονται στα θερινά ιδρύματα που 
υποστηρίχτηκαν από την αντιπροσωπεία εθνικής ασφάλειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a más de 200 unidades educacionales en
aritmética, álgebra, cálculo, análisis de datos, fracciones, 
geometría, teoría del número, pre-a'lgebra, pre-ca'lculo, 
probabilidad, estadística, y trigonometría. Las unidades 
fueron desarrolladas por los profesores que atendían a los institutos
del verano patrocinados por la agencia de la seguridad nacional.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205993</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107669</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/collected-learning-units-in-mathematics-and-statisticsematics</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
